name: The Weeny's Quest
description:
Ludum Dare 46

Keep it alive

Little Weeny is looking for his mom but he is constantly distracted by sweets along the way.
Save the character by turning traps off and on. 
Build the bridges over the pits filled with water or lava.
Protect Weeny from enemies by using cannons or blocking their path with walls.

[WASD] - camera movement
Traps kill you and stun enemies.
